affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
cmb:
140/155/160/165
11
lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.
name: morphling_waveform

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning the target while dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum damage and the minimum stun is dealt. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun and minimum damage are dealt.
notes:
Knocks the target back 100 - 300 units.
Projectile moves at 1150 speed.
attrib:
BASE DAMAGE: 20/40/60/80
DAMAGE MIN AGI MULTIPLIER: 0.25/0.25/0.25/0.25
DAMAGE MAX AGI MULTIPLIER: 0.5/1/1.5/2
STUN MIN: 0.25/0.25/0.25/0.25
STUN MAX: 1.25/2.25/3.25/4.25
CAST RANGE: 600/700/800/900
cmb:
100/100/100/100
10
lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
name: morphling_adaptive_strike

desc: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.
notes:
Morph can be activated or deactivated while Morphling is disabled, but not while silenced.
Morph can't convert stats from items.
attrib:
MANA PER SECOND: 30/30/30/30
POINTS PER SHIFT: 2/2/2/2
SHIFT RATE: 1/0.5/0.33/0.2
BONUS AGILITY: 3/4/5/6
cmb: 0
lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
name: morphling_morph_agi

desc: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Strength.
notes:
Morph works while Morphling is disabled, but not when silenced.
Morph can't convert stats from items.
attrib:
MANA PER SECOND: 30/30/30/30
POINTS PER SHIFT: 2/2/2/2
SHIFT RATE: 1/0.5/0.33/0.2
BONUS STRENGTH: 3/4/5/6
cmb: 0
lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
name: morphling_morph_str

desc:
Morphling becomes a hybrid replication of a target allied hero, and can cast all of that hero's non-ultimate abilities. Morphling will reappear at the location of the hybrid if it dies, or when its duration ends.
Cannot be cast while Morphling has an active Replicate.
cmb:
200
140
name: morphling_hybrid

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Morphling replicates any hero, friend or foe, dealing 50% of the original Hero's outgoing damage while taking 100% of any incoming damage. At any time, Morphling can instantly take the position of the Replicate for 150 mana. If Morphling dies, the Replicate will expire.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
attrib:
DURATION: 30/45/60
REPLICATE DAMAGE: 50%/50%/50%
REPLICATE DAMAGE TAKEN: 100%/100%/100%
CAST RANGE: 700/1100/1500
cmb:
25/25/25
80
lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
name: morphling_replicate

desc: Morphling switches into his replication, instantly taking its position.
cmb: 150/150/150
name: morphling_morph_replicate
